snippet: Riverhead Books has acquired the memoir of Carrie Brownstein, a singer, songwriter and guitarist in Sleater-Kinney, the beloved all-female band.
abstract: Riverhead Books acquires the memoir of Carrie Brownstein, former guitarist in the beloved indie-rock band Sleater Kinney and current star of IFC comedy television series Portlandia.

byline.original: By JULIE BOSMAN; Compiled by ADAM W. KEPLER

lead_paragraph: Riverhead Books has acquired the memoir of Carrie Brownstein, a singer, songwriter and guitarist in Sleater-Kinney, the beloved all-female band.

headline.main: An Indie-Rock Memoir From Carrie Brownstein
headline.print_headline: An Indie-Rock Memoir From Carrie Brownstein
